Text: Special Offer for VentureWire SubscribersJeffrey Id like to tell you about another opportunity to understand the people and companies driving the private equity markets let you know that you can save by registering for Financial Services Outlook now and offer you an exclusive chance to win a free registration to a future conference from Technologic Partners Our database shows that investment in financial services technology companies is very strong with over million in private equity invested in the sector this year Many of those venturebacked companies as well as other strong investment candidates will be presenting at Financial Services Outlook in New York on July at the Marriott World Trade Center Read on to find out how to be entered in a special contest for VentureWire subscribers The efinance landscape is rapidly redefining itself and the editors at Technologic Partners have put together a comprehensive agenda and compelling set of private companies Understand the growing oppor tunities for companies in the following illustrative sectors Online Banking and Trading Payment and Presentment Investment Services Financial Services Globalization In one day Financial Services Outlook will deliver Private Equity Platform Speak with some CEOs of the most promising start ups as they present their business plans to investors Keynote Presentations Listen to executives such as Robert L Reynolds vice chairman and COO of Fidelity Investments and Pete Sinisgalli president and COO of CheckFree as they detail their views of the technological revolution in financial services Product Demonstration Reception Network with fellow attendees at an endofconference reception where up to companies will demonstrate firsthand their services and products You may check out the latest conference agenda at vwasp So Jeffrey are you ready to sign up for Financial Services Outlook on July in New York If so register online at vwasp Pay only a savings of if you register by June And for all those VentureWire subscribers who enter the code FSOVW in the last box of the registration page weve arranged an exclusive drawing for a free registration to a future Outlook conference The deadline for entering this contest is June the same day as early registration deadline This is your chance to win an up to value based on the cost of a day conference for free when you register early for Financial Services Outlook Good luck and I hope to see you in New York on July Thank you Brian OConnell Publisher VentureWire vwasp If youd prefer not to receive such messages from us follow this link ecancelSolicitaspe NRONCOM and well make sure you dont in the future Note This special offer is valid only for original recipients of this email and is non transferable If you have already registered for Financial Services Outlook prior to receiving this offer you are not eligible for the contest Registration and payment must be received by June by pm EST to be entered in the contest Contest prize free registration is only valid for an Outlook conference scheduled to take place between and Free registration is non transferable ABOUT THIS EMAIL Your registration to VentureWire included granting us permission to send you information about new features and other products from Technologic Partners We are committed to protecting your privacy VentureWire Financial Services Outlook and Outlook are trademarks and service marks of Technologic Partners LP

Breakfast with VentureWire An Energy Wake Up CallWill you be able to join other VentureWire subscribers in the Bay area for this months breakfast briefing Well be gathering at the San Mateo Marriott next Tuesday to hear Bryant Tongs thoughts on this months topic The Energy Sector Urgent Needs Emerging Opportunities Its becoming clear that farreaching changes in energy markets along with urgent production and distribution needs across the country have created a wealth of new opportunities for hightech investment at a time when deal flow in other sectors has significantly diminished Join us for a presentation by Bryant J Tong managing director of Nth Power Technologies on the important trends key strategies emerging opportunities and potential risks involved in investing in this growing sector Nth Power Technologies is a venture capital firm focused on investment opportunities arising from the restructuring of the global energy utility marketplace For VentureWire subscribers we have extended the early registration discount through this Friday July Pay only for the July th VentureWire Breakfast The Energy Sector Urgent Needs Emerging Opportunities So register online at prior to July and pay only Hope youll be able to join us on July Best Brian OConnell Publisher VentureWire
